author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:
Resolves #26222

- Fix pat::UserHolder association for PatCandidates. In IBs we get dict lost definition errors like
```
Math : pat::UserHolder< ROOT::Math::SVector< double, 2 > >
Math : pat::UserHolder< ROOT::Math::SVector< double, 2u > >
```
- Moved `Phase2TrackerDigi` dictionaries in to DataFormats/Phase2TrackerDigi package
- Allow `edm::Wrapper.+edm::AssociationMap.+TrackingParticle` type dicts be in RecoCandidate instead of TrackingAnalysis

#### PR validation:

Build and run all unit tests which were failed in IB after the merge of #26116
```
---> test testmat succeeded
---> test testDDCompactView succeeded
---> test dumpDDCompactView succeeded
---> test dumpDDExpandedView succeeded
---> test edmCatalogFileLocator_t succeeded
---> test TestFWCoreIntegrationStandalone succeeded
---> test unitTestsGroup_1 succeeded
---> test unitTestsGroup_4 succeeded
---> test runtestPhysicsToolsPatAlgos succeeded
```

duplicate dict checkers also runs fine without any errors
```
> duplicateReflexLibrarySearch.py --lostDef
Searching for 'classes_def.xml' in '/build/muz/clean/CMSSW_10_6_X_2019-03-19-2300/src'.
**** SKIPPING './CondCore/Utilities/src/classes_def.xml' - Doesn't seem to have proper information.
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: [106X] Cleanup lost dictionaries errors
